pullrequest.title: Catch (almost) all typos that are passed to ign-cmake functions or macros

content.raw: In commit 23c21e9 I've created a macro (for internal use in `ign-cmake`) called `_ign_cmake_parse_arguments(~)`. All of the functions inside of `ign-cmake` can simply replace their call to `cmake_parse_arguments(~)` with `_ign_cmake_parse_arguments(~)`, and it will catch (almost) all typos that are passed to the function.
content.html: In commit 23c21e9 I've created a macro (for internal use in ign-cmake) called _ign_cmake_parse_arguments(~). All of the functions inside of ign-cmake can simply replace their call to cmake_parse_arguments(~) with _ign_cmake_parse_arguments(~), and it will catch (almost) all typos that are passed to the function.
